title: The Neighbor's Son
description: **This is book 1 of a 4-part series called The Forbidden Love Series.When high school teacher Sidney McDougal swung her front door open that Saturday morning, she was expecting to find a door-to-door salesman or a Jehovah witness standing on the other side of it. Instead, she found Cade Fisher, a devastatingly handsome handyman who would instantly become her greatest obsession and the subject of her dirtiest fantasies and dreams.Nothing wrong with a little fantasy, right? Wrong. Cade is barely out of high school and his mother lives down the street from Sidney who is 32 and getting over a painful divorce. Sidney is able to keep her fantasies and filthy dreams in her head...until the neighbor's son ends up naked in her pool.This 18K-word erotic romance novella is intended for mature audiences age 18+.Coming soon in the Forbidden Love Series:The Neighbor's Son 2: Mind GamesThe Neighbor's Son 3: Sex TapeThe Neighbor's Son 4: Stay with Me
